document.full_text: bank of japan governor masaaki shirakawa said the country's economy was in a very severe state due to damage from the march earthquake, signaling that the central bank was sticking to its ultra-loose monetary policy bias.
document.title: boj warns economy in severe state, beating deflation not enough
lines_and_colors: bank of japan governor masaaki shirakawa said the country's economy was in a very severe state due to damage from the march earthquake, signaling that the central bank was sticking to its ultra-loose monetary policy bias.
